section.title: sps-ig-diameterapp-0_dynamic.policy
section.codeblock: { "e45569dd-da24-43ce-a18b-5c7c0d5b4925_dynamic.policy": { "schedule": [], "192.168.3.62": { "group_level_backup_list": [], "backuplist": [ "/tmp/sdc_backup/", # Does not exist "/etc/fstab", # Does not exist "/etc/td-agent/plugin", # /etc/td-agent/plugin/ dir is empty "/etc/confd/conf.d/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist "/etc/confd/templates/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/ChargingCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/PCRFCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/RuleAttributeDictionary.xsl", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/peertimeout.properties", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/VsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/ChargingVsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/vsa/*.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/vsa/dra/CustomAttributeImplementersTemplate.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/TACData.dsv", "/opt/tpa/osgi/server/all/conf/ldap/*.xml", "/appdata/LCM/sysdata/", # /appdata does not exist "/appdata/LCM/fstab" # /appdata does not exist ], "excludelist": [] } } }
